page.title: 16BASEBALL
page.content: Baseball is a bat and ball game between two teams of eleven.One side fields while the other bats.It is played on a diamond shaped playing area and there are no boundaries. The batting side score runs by hitting the ball then running around the "diamond's" four bases. A run is scored every time a base is reached. All the way around is four runs. You can stop at a base if you want to,but the other bases reached will not then count as runs.Every team bats until all eleven are run out. The fielding side have to get the other side out.The bowler,bowls under arm from the middle of the diamond to the batsman.They can get the other team out by catching them, basing them(Touching the base before the batter gets there) or by bowling so that they miss the ball.
